description: Utilizing Django for the development of integrations in the QuickSync(https://quicksync.pro) app.
Worked on integrating SquareSpace into the inventory management system.
Testing different integrations making sure they work as expected.
Using tools like Grafana to check for errors that might be existent in the app.
Organized and facilitated educational activities related to data structures and algorithms.
Delivered engaging lectures and practice sessions twice a week.
Created informative and visually appealing learning slides.
Conducted interactive virtual lectures, promoting active participation.
Managed attendance and ensured smooth coordination of sessions.
Utilized React and Next.js frameworks to develop dynamic and performant web applications.
Implemented Redux Toolkit for efficient state management.
Leveraged Tailwind CSS as a styling library to create modern and responsive user interfaces.
Collaborated with senior developers to deliver high-quality code.
Actively participated in code reviews and debugging sessions.
Leveraged Node.js, Express, and MongoDB for development processes.
Utilized Jest and Supertest for comprehensive testing.
Implemented MongoDB aggregation pipelines to extract valuable insights.
Contributed to the successful launch of LabConnect, a groundbreaking project.
